summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein expressing interest in purchasing a new large plane or another large house. It indicates his financial capability and desire for luxury items.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing his interest in purchasing luxury items.

keyFacts: The email was sent on May 7, 2009.
Jeffrey Epstein is looking to buy a large plane or house.
The email reflects Epstein's financial status and interests.
